participant_1.background:
I've been working on my farm for over 20 years.
I used to play with my toy cars a lot when I was younger, but now I don't have as much time for them.
The most valued material possession I have is my teddy bear from childhood
i like green apples.
I'm proud of the love and care I give to my family and pets.

participant_2.background:
I want to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.
I love nature and my garden is a big part of that.
i have not gone home in over two years.
I've lost a lot of things in my life, but losing my diamond at the debutante ball was by far the most difficult.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.

content.text: I'm good! I'm a little tired, but I'm excited to start my shift soon.
What do you do for work?
I'm a Christmas tree decorator! I love working with nature and making things beautiful.
That sounds like a fun job! I've never been to a Christmas tree farm before.
You should go! It's really magical to see all the trees decorated for Christmas.
I will! I'm sure my kids would love it too.
I bet they would! What do you do for work?
I'm a farmer. I've been working on my farm for over 20 years.
That's awesome! I love nature and I think farming is a great job.
Thank you! I love it too. It's hard work, but it's also very rewarding.
I bet it is. What's your favorite part of the job?
I love working outside and seeing the fruits of my labor. I also love working with my animals.
That sounds really nice. I wish I could work outside more.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! Have a great day at work!
